translation.en: ♪ Look away, look away ♪
♪ This show will wreck your evening Your whole life and your day ♪
translation.fr:
‎Cette série va vous gâcher
‎Vos journées, vos soirées

translation.en: ♪ Every single episode Is nothing but dismay ♪
♪ So look away Look away, look away ♪
♪ Three children lose their home And go to live with someone awful ♪
translation.fr:
‎Trois petits orphelins sont adoptés
‎Par un homme affreux

translation.en: ♪ He tries to steal their fortune With a plot that's not quite lawful ♪
translation.fr:
‎Il joue la comédie
‎Mais c'est à leur argent qu'il en veut

translation.en: ♪ It's hard to fathom how the orphans Managed to live through it ♪
translation.fr:
‎On a du mal à croire
‎Que les enfants aient pu l'supporter

translation.en: ♪ But how a decent person like yourself Would even want to view it ♪
translation.fr:
‎Et encore moins que vous soyez
‎Toujours assis à les regarder

translation.en: ♪ Just look away, look away ♪
♪ There's nothing but horror And inconvenience on the way ♪
translation.fr:
‎Vous allez sangloter,
‎Crier, hurler comme des bébés

translation.en: ♪ Ask any stable person "Should I watch?" And they will say ♪
translation.fr:
‎Si jamais vous insistez
‎Vous allez nous détester

translation.en: ♪ Look away, look away, look away ♪
♪ Look away, look away ♪
♪ Look away, look away ♪
translation.fr: ADAPTÉE DES ROMANS DE LEMONY SNICKET

translation.en: If you are interested in stories with happy endings,
translation.fr:
‎Si vous aimez les histoires
‎qui finissent bien,

translation.en: then you would be better off somewhere else.
In this story, not only is there no happy ending,
translation.fr: ‎Cette histoire ne se finit pas bien,

translation.en: there is no happy beginning, and very few happy things in the middle.
translation.fr:
‎elle commence mal,
‎et il n'y a rien de réjouissant au milieu.

translation.en: My name is Lemony Snicket.
It is my solemn duty to bring to light the sorry history
translation.fr:
‎C'est mon devoir
‎de vous conter la triste histoire

translation.en: of the Baudelaire children as it happened so many years ago.
translation.fr:
‎des enfants Baudelaire,
‎comme elle s'est déroulée jadis.

translation.en: But you in the audience have no such obligation,
and I would advise all our viewers to turn away immediately
translation.fr:
‎et je vous conseillerais
‎de détourner le regard immédiatement

translation.en: and watch something more pleasant instead.
This story will be dreadful, melancholy and calamitous,
a word which here means "dreadful and melancholy."
That is because not very many happy things happened
translation.fr:
‎car il n'y a pas eu
‎beaucoup de moments joyeux

translation.en: in the lives of the Baudelaires.
Violet, Klaus and Sunny were intelligent children.
translation.fr:
‎Violette, Klaus et Prunille
‎étaient des enfants intelligents,

translation.en: Charming and resourceful, they had pleasant facial features,
but they were extremely unlucky.
Most everything that happened to them was rife
with misfortune, misery and despair.
-I'm sorry to tell you this... -[siren wailing]
...but that's how the story goes.
Briny Beach, please.
The Baudelaire family lived in an enormous mansion
translation.fr:
‎La famille Baudelaire vivait
‎dans un immense manoir

translation.en: at the heart of a dirty and busy city,
and one day the parents rather unexpectedly asked their children
translation.fr:
‎Un jour, les parents ont demandé
‎à leurs enfants

translation.en: to take a rickety trolley alone to the seashore.
translation.fr:
‎d'aller seuls à la plage
‎dans un tramway branlant.

translation.en: I wonder why Mother and Father didn't want to come with us.
Maybe they don't like this rickety trolley.
"Rickety" is a word here which means
"unsteady" or "likely to collapse at any moment."
translation.fr:
‎"peu stable ou qui risque
‎de se désintégrer à tout moment."

translation.en: Hey, kids! Aren't you going to the Festive Fun Fair,
translation.fr:
‎Vous n'allez pas
‎à la Festive Fête foraine

translation.en: with all the jolly rides and games and snacks?
"Festive" means "fun."
We know what "festive" means.
translation.fr: ‎On sait ce que ça veut dire.

translation.en: Thank you, but it's a perfect morning to go to the beach.
translation.fr:
‎Merci, mais c'est une matinée idéale
‎pour la plage.

translation.en: -It's gray and cloudy. -That's what makes it perfect.
translation.fr:
‎- Il fait gris.
‎- C'est pour ça que c'est parfait.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
When Briny Beach was hot and sunny, the seashore was crowded with tourists
translation.fr:
‎Quand il faisait beau et chaud,
‎la plage était bondée de touristes,

translation.en: and it was impossible to find a good place to lay one's blanket.
translation.fr:
‎et il était impossible
‎de trouver un endroit où se poser.

translation.en: On gray and cloudy days, the Baudelaires had the beach more or less to themselves,
translation.fr:
‎Par temps gris,
‎les Baudelaire avaient la plage pour eux

translation.en: so they could work together on their projects and experiments.
translation.fr:
‎et pouvaient travailler
‎à leurs projets et expériences.

translation.en: -Are you ready? -Let's get to work.
Do you think this will be as good as the mailbox? I think this will be even better than the mailbox.
translation.fr:
‎- Ce sera comme la boîte aux lettres ?
‎- Encore mieux.

translation.en: [Lemony] Violet Baudelaire was the eldest Baudelaire child.
She was 14 years old, right-handed,
had a real knack for inventing and building unusual devices.
translation.fr:
‎et adorait inventer
‎et construire des objets insolites.

translation.en: I'm having a problem with the grandfather clock.
Can you show me what the specific issues are?
See? It toasts the bread, but the minute hand falls behind five minutes.
translation.fr:
‎Elle grille le pain
‎mais l'aiguille retarde de cinq minutes.

translation.en: It could be a problem with the gears.
[sighs] That'd be disappointing. I made them myself.
translation.fr: ‎Ça serait fâcheux. Je l'ai fait moi-même.

translation.en: [Lemony] When Violet Baudelaire tied her hair up like that,
it was a sure sign that the pulleys, levers and gears of her inventing mind
translation.fr:
‎ça signifiait que les engrenages
‎de son esprit inventif

translation.en: were working at top speed.
Klaus, at what angle are the prevailing currents?
translation.fr:
‎Klaus, à quel angle
‎sont les courants dominants ?

translation.en: The angle of the prevailing currents...
Klaus Baudelaire was the middle child and only boy.
translation.fr:
‎Klaus Baudelaire était le cadet
‎et l'unique garçon.

translation.en: He was a little older than 12 and wore glasses, which made him look intelligent.
translation.fr:
‎Il avait 12 ans, et ses lunettes
‎lui donnaient un air intelligent.

translation.en: Of course, we still need the right projectile.
He was intelligent.
[Klaus] Violet, I'm not sure I understand this passage of Proust.
translation.fr:
‎Je ne suis pas sûr
‎de comprendre ce passage de Proust.

translation.en: Could you read it to me?
"Happiness is beneficial for the body,
translation.fr: ‎"Le bonheur est salutaire pour le corps,

translation.en: but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind."
translation.fr:
‎mais le chagrin développe
‎les forces de l'esprit."

translation.en: It could be the translation.
Maybe it makes more sense in the original French.
translation.fr: ‎Ça doit avoir plus de sens en français.

translation.en: Sunny, do we have the right projectile?
-[babbles] -[Lemony] Sunny Baudelaire was an infant,
a word which here means "a person of the age
at which one mostly speaks in a series of unintelligible shrieks,"
translation.fr:
‎ne permet de parler
‎qu'avec des cris inintelligibles,

translation.en: so most people had trouble understanding what she was saying.
[Lemony] What Sunny lacked in communication skills, however,
she made up for with the size and sharpness of her four teeth.
translation.fr:
‎par la taille
‎et le tranchant de ses quatre dents.

translation.en: That's perfect, Sunny. Thank you.
Excuse me, Violet, but why are you using your left hand?
I'm curious to see if I can skip the rock as far with my left as I can with my right.
translation.fr:
‎Pour voir si je peux lancer le caillou
‎aussi loin qu'avec la droite.

translation.en: I don't mean to criticize, but standard scientific method calls for stable systematics.
translation.fr:
‎Sans vouloir te critiquer, la méthode
‎scientifique exige la constance.

translation.en: You should use your standard right-handedness.
That does seem reasonable.
Klaus, what's that thing Einstein said?
"The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious.
translation.fr:
‎"Le plus beau sentiment du monde,
‎c'est le sens du mystère.

translation.en: It is the source of all true art and science."
translation.fr:
‎Il est la source
‎de tout art et science véritables."

translation.en: And what's that thing James Brown said?
"I got something that makes me want to shout."
translation.fr: ‎"Ce que j'ai me donne envie de crier."

translation.en: "I've got something that tells me what it's all about."
translation.fr: ‎"Ce que j'ai me dit ce qu'il en est."

translation.en: [both] "I'm super bad!"
It worked.
-I never expected otherwise. -[chuckles]
Yes, the invention worked.
This would be a perfect time to leave
translation.fr: ‎Ce serait parfait de les quitter ici

translation.en: and pretend the rest of the story was just as happy and successful.
translation.fr:
‎et de prétendre que la suite
‎de l'histoire était tout aussi heureuse.

translation.en: I just wish Mother and Father had seen it.
It's not like them to send us off on our own so unexpectedly.
translation.fr:
‎Ça leur ressemble pas
‎de nous laisser partir seuls.

translation.en: [Lemony] Certainly, I wish I could go back
and change the history of the Baudelaires at this very moment
translation.fr:
‎et changer leur histoire
‎à ce moment précis,

translation.en: rather than the descent into misery, tribulation and...
translation.fr:
‎pour éviter cette descente
‎vers la souffrance, le malheur et...

translation.en: dire inconvenience which will occur shortly.
translation.fr:
‎les terribles désagréments
‎qui vont se produire sous peu.

translation.en: It only seems scary because of all the mist.
translation.fr: ‎C'est la brume qui la rend effrayante.

translation.en: It's Mr. Poe.
From the bank? What's he doing here?
-How do you do? -How do you do?
[coughs] Fine, thank you.
It's a nice day.
It is a nice day.
I have some very bad news for you children.
Your parents have perished in a terrible fire.
translation.fr:
‎Vos parents ont péri
‎dans un terrible incendie.

translation.en: They perished in a fire that destroyed your entire home.
translation.fr:
‎Ils ont péri dans un incendie
‎qui a ravagé toute votre maison.

translation.en: I'm very, very sorry to have to tell you this...
translation.fr:
‎Je suis vraiment navré
‎d'avoir à vous annoncer ceci...

translation.en: my dears.
"Perished" means "killed."
We know what "perished" means.
translation.fr: ‎On sait ce que ça veut dire.

translation.en: I have spent months of research and years crying myself to sleep,
translation.fr:
‎J'ai enquêté pendant des mois et passé
‎des années à m'endormir en pleurant

translation.en: trying to discover the precise cause of the Baudelaire fire.
translation.fr:
‎pour tenter de trouver la cause exacte
‎de l'incendie des Baudelaire.

translation.en: But... all my associates and I have managed to learn
is that neither the official fire department
translation.fr: ‎que ni les pompiers de la caserne

translation.en: nor the volunteer fire department arrived in time to stop the blaze.
translation.fr:
‎ni les pompiers volontaires
‎n'étaient arrivés à temps pour l'éteindre.

translation.en: And within moments, the entire Baudelaire mansion
was engulfed in flames.
It is useless for me to describe to you how terrible Violet, Klaus and Sunny felt
translation.fr:
‎Inutile de décrire l'affliction
‎de Violette, Klaus et Prunille

translation.en: in the time that followed.
If you have ever lost somebody very important to you,
then you already know how it feels.
And if you haven't... you cannot possibly imagine it.
translation.fr:
‎Si ce n'est pas le cas,
‎vous ne pouvez l'imaginer.

translation.en: I've never been through anything like this myself,
translation.fr: ‎Je n'ai jamais vécu ce genre de chose,

translation.en: but I can imagine just how you feel.
I did think you'd want to see what remains of your home,
translation.fr:
‎J'ai pensé que vous voudriez voir
‎ce qu'il reste de votre maison,

translation.en: even though it is... [sighs] more or less, um...
translation.fr: ‎même si elle est plus ou moins...

translation.en: It's all gone.
I just want to assure you Baudelaires that you have absolutely nothing...
translation.fr:
‎Je voulais vous assurer
‎que vous n'avez plus rien...

translation.en: We have absolutely nothing.
[sighs] ...to worry about.
I am the executor of your parents' estate,
which means I'll be handling all matters concerning everything they left behind.
translation.fr:
‎je m'occuperai donc
‎de tout ce qu'ils vous ont laissé.

translation.en: What did they leave behind?
Financial security.
[Mr. Poe] Your parents left behind an enormous fortune,
translation.fr:
‎Vos parents vous ont laissé
‎une immense fortune

translation.en: which will be yours when Violet comes of age.
translation.fr:
‎qui sera à vous
‎à la majorité de Violette.

translation.en: Until then, you will be placed with the proper guardian, or guardians,
translation.fr:
‎En attendant, vous serez placés
‎auprès du ou des tuteurs appropriés,

translation.en: as decided by myself and my fellow bankers at Mulctuary Money Management.
translation.fr:
‎comme décidé avec mes confrères
‎du Comptoir d'Escompte Pal-Adsu.

translation.en: Say goodbye, Baudelaires.
Goodbye.
[Mr. Poe] Until we've identified your designated guardian,
translation.fr: ‎Le temps de vous trouver un tuteur,

translation.en: you'll stay with my family.
That's not so bad, is it, Baudelaires?
translation.fr: ‎Ce n'est pas si mal que ça, non ?

translation.en: I'm sure you'll become fast friends with Edgar and Albert.
-[Edgar] It's a raven. -[Albert] It's a crow!
-It's a raven! -It's a crow!
It's chicken. Boiled chicken.
And we have boiled potatoes and blanched string beans.
translation.fr:
‎Avec des patates bouillies
‎et des haricots blanchis.

translation.en: What does "blanched" mean?
-It means "boiled." -Nobody asked you.
translation.fr:
‎- Bouilli.
‎- On ne t'a rien demandé.

translation.en: Now, now, son.
No, my darling, Albert is right. Nobody asked the Baudelaires.
translation.fr:
‎Non, chéri. Édouard a raison.
‎On n'a rien demandé aux Baudelaire.

translation.en: But, honey, look!
Dearest, maybe not in front of the children.
translation.fr: ‎MANOIR DES BAUDELAIRE DÉTRUIT ‎Pas devant les enfants.

translation.en: But I thought it would cheer them up, the little Gloomy Guses.
translation.fr:
‎Je pensais que ça réjouirait
‎ces petits déprimés.

translation.en: I had my star reporter write an article for the front page
translation.fr:
‎J'ai demandé à mon meilleur reporter
‎d'écrire un article pour la une,

translation.en: so that everyone will know your home was destroyed and you're orphans now.
translation.fr:
‎pour qu'on sache
‎que vous êtes des orphelins sans toit.

translation.en: The front page!
Some people wait a lifetime for that.
translation.fr: ‎Certains attendent toute une vie en vain.

translation.en: And darling, look... you're mentioned, too!
translation.fr: ‎Chéri, regarde, on parle aussi de toi !

translation.en: "Generosity shown by prominent member of the banking community."
translation.fr:
‎"Un membre respectable de la banque
‎s'est montré généreux."

translation.en: If your bosses at the bank see this, it may spell
translation.fr: ‎Si ton patron voit ça, ça voudra dire :

translation.en: P-R-O-M-A-T-I-O-N!
-Promation? -Promotion!
-No, that's not how you spell "promotion." -[Eleanora] Promotion.
translation.fr: ‎Non, ça ne s'écrit pas comme ça.

translation.en: -See? I've been saying it-- -Honey, P-R-R...
Listen to what I'm saying...
-I'm sorry. -...before you start speaking!
-[Eleanora] P-R-O-- -I don't... feel very hungry.
translation.fr:
‎- P-R-O...
‎- Je n'ai pas très faim.

translation.en: May we go to our rooms?
[coughs] "Rooms"?
-Good night, Edgar. -Good night, Albert.
translation.fr:
‎- Bonne nuit, Edgar.
‎- Bonne nuit, Édouard.

translation.en: -Good night, Albert. -Good night, Edgar.
translation.fr:
‎- Bonne nuit, Édouard.
‎- Bonne nuit, Edgar.

translation.en: And good night, guests.
You must feel terrible, and you must miss your parents very much.
translation.fr:
‎Vous devez être très tristes,
‎et vos parents doivent vous manquer.

translation.en: We do.
You do what?
Say it.
We feel terrible, and we miss our parents very much.
translation.fr:
‎On est très tristes,
‎et nos parents nous manquent.

translation.en: [sighs deeply] That's gonna make a wonderful headline.
Good night, Baudelaires. Remember, our home is your home.
translation.fr:
‎Bonne nuit, les Baudelaire.
‎Vous êtes ici chez vous.

translation.en: But don't touch anything.
How'd you do it?
Do what?
Set the fire.
[Lemony] In the years since, I've inquired what became of the Brothers Poe.
translation.fr:
‎Ces dernières années, j'ai cherché
‎ce qu'étaient devenus les frères Poe.

translation.en: One followed his father into the world of banking.
translation.fr:
‎L'un a suivi son père
‎dans le monde de la banque.

translation.en: The other lives in a cave and talks to sheep.
translation.fr:
‎L'autre vit dans une grotte
‎et parle aux moutons.

translation.en: They each think the other has it better.
I regret to inform you, the Baudelaires' fate was worse.
translation.fr:
‎J'ai le regret de vous informer ‎que les Baudelaire eurent
‎un sort pire encore.

translation.en: Chop-chop, Baudelaires!
Now that I've found you a suitable guardian,
translation.fr: ‎Je vous ai trouvé un tuteur approprié.

translation.en: I'm going to take you to your new home before banking hours begin.
translation.fr:
‎Je vous conduis chez vous
‎avant l'ouverture de la banque.

translation.en: I know you must be nervous about living with a guardian.
translation.fr:
‎Vous devez être angoissés
‎de vivre chez un tuteur.

translation.en: I remember how I was when I was your age.
translation.fr: ‎Je me souviens quand j'avais votre âge.

translation.en: We're all different ages.
Well, I should think at least a fraction of your unhappiness
will turn to excitement when you meet this man.
translation.fr:
‎se changera en joie
‎quand vous verrez cet homme.

translation.en: I know he's certainly very eager to meet you.
translation.fr: ‎Il doit avoir hâte de vous rencontrer.

translation.en: And he's employed as an actor, so you know his excitement is genuine.
translation.fr:
‎Il est acteur,
‎vous verrez que sa joie est réelle.

translation.en: His name is Count Olaf.
-Never heard of him. -He's either... Let's see. What is it?
translation.fr:
‎- Jamais entendu parler de lui.
‎- Il est...

translation.en: Your third cousin fourth time removed, or your fourth cousin three times removed.
translation.fr:
‎votre 3e cousin au 4e degré
‎ou votre 4e cousin au 3e degré.

translation.en: In any case, he's removed.
Still, he's only three miles away, and your parents' will was very specific
translation.fr:
‎mais qui n'habite qu'à 5 km. ‎Selon la volonté de vos parents,
‎votre parent le plus proche vous élèvera.

translation.en: about your being raised by your closest living relative.
translation.fr:
‎Selon la volonté de vos parents,
‎votre parent le plus proche vous élèvera.

translation.en: Does he really think that's what "closest living relative" means?
translation.fr: ‎Il croit que c'est ce que ça veut dire ?

translation.en: -Mr. Poe? -Hmm? If he lives so close by, why didn't our parents ever invite him over?
translation.fr:
‎S'il habite si près, pourquoi nos parents
‎ne l'ont-ils jamais invité ?

translation.en: Possibly because he was very busy.
As a banker, I'm often very busy myself.
translation.fr:
‎En tant que banquier,
‎je suis très occupé aussi.

translation.en: Which is why this guardian drop-off is going to be a bit hasty.
translation.fr:
‎C'est pour ça
‎que je vais vous y déposer hâtivement.

translation.en: "Hasty" means "quickly," because I'm due at the bank soon.
We know what "hasty" means.
translation.fr: ‎On sait ce que ça veut dire.

translation.en: Hello there! Salutations! Shalom!
You must be the Baudelaire children!
Yes, I'm Violet Baudelaire,
and this is my brother, Klaus, and this is my sister, Sunny.
translation.fr: ‎Mon frère, Klaus, et ma sœur, Prunille.

translation.en: And this is Mr. Poe. He's been arranging things for us.
translation.fr:
‎Et voici M. Poe.
‎C'est lui qui s'est occupé de tout.

translation.en: Mulctuary Money Management. My name and title are on the card.
translation.fr:
‎Comptoir d'Escompte Pal-Adsu.
‎Mes nom et titre sont sur la carte.

translation.en: Although I may be in line for a promotion, so that might change.
translation.fr:
‎Je suis en lice pour une promotion,
‎ça pourrait changer.

translation.en: Oh, well, I am Justice Strauss of the High Court.
translation.fr: ‎Je suis la juge Abbott de la Haute Cour.

translation.en: Forgive my not shaking hands, but as you can see, I am a mountain of parcels.
translation.fr:
‎Pardon de ne pas vous serrer la main.
‎Je suis très chargée.

translation.en: I just bought a new toolkit because my food processor broke.
translation.fr:
‎J'ai acheté une trousse à outils,
‎car mon mixeur a rendu l'âme.

translation.en: Although I don't know who I think I'm kidding,
translation.fr: ‎Je ne sais pas à quoi je joue,

translation.en: because I have no inventive or mechanical skill whatsoever.
translation.fr:
‎car je n'ai aucun talent
‎d'inventeur ou de bricoleur.

translation.en: Then I treated myself to new file cards for my private library,
translation.fr:
‎Je me suis fait plaisir en achetant
‎des fiches à classer pour ma bibliothèque,

translation.en: and frankly I don't have an acute literary sense.
translation.fr: ‎mais je ne suis pas très littéraire.

translation.en: And then, to top it all off, I forgot to buy a new bread knife.
translation.fr:
‎Enfin, pour couronner le tout,
‎j'ai oublié de racheter un couteau à pain.

translation.en: It means I have no possible way of cutting up this baguette
translation.fr:
‎Je n'ai aucun moyen
‎de couper cette baguette

translation.en: into bite-sized pieces,
which is really unfortunate
because I was gonna take the bread that was cut up
with a white bean hummus--
We'd be more than happy to be of assistance, Justice Strauss.
translation.fr:
‎Nous serions ravis de vous aider,
‎juge Abbott.

translation.en: My sister is very mechanically minded, and I'm quite adept at library science.
translation.fr:
‎Aucun mécanisme ne résiste à ma sœur,
‎et je m'y connais en bibliothèque.

translation.en: What my sister means is her teeth are perfect for slicing bread.
translation.fr:
‎Ma sœur dit que ses dents sont parfaites
‎pour trancher le pain.

translation.en: [gasps] Well, how wonderful!
How lucky am I to have such unusual children in my life?
translation.fr:
‎J'ai de la chance de connaître
‎des enfants aussi extraordinaires !

translation.en: Are you Count Olaf's wife?
What?
Oh! Oh, no!
No. No. Goodness me, no.
No, I don't even really know him that well.
translation.fr: ‎Non, je ne le connais pas vraiment.

translation.en: He's... he's just my neighbor.
His house is over there.
That's strange.
He said specifically he was waiting very eagerly to get his hands on you.
translation.fr:
‎Il a bien précisé qu'il avait hâte
‎de mettre la main sur vous.

translation.en: Hello. No.
Hello, hello, hello, children.
I am Count Olaf, the renowned actor and your new guardian.
translation.fr:
‎Je suis le comte Olaf,
‎le célèbre acteur et votre nouveau tuteur.

translation.en: You're welcome.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Please, come in, and mind you wipe your feet on the mat
translation.fr:
‎Veuillez entrer
‎et essuyez vos pieds sur le paillasson

translation.en: so you don't track in any mud.
And don't forget your enormous fortune!
Welcome to my humble home, orphans.
And...
-a man with a hat on. -Poe.
Actually, I'm about to be rather wealthy. So if you'll excuse me--
No, we spoke on the phone. I'm from Mulctuary Money Management.
translation.fr:
‎On s'est parlé au téléphone.
‎Je suis du Comptoir d'Escompte Pal-Adsu.

translation.en: Hmm. "Money" sounds familiar, but--
The bank. I'm from the bank.
Ah, yes, the bank.
Well, welcome to my humble home.
[coughing] It does seem to need a little work.
Well, I realize it's not as fancy as the Baudelaire mansion,
translation.fr:
‎Je sais que ce n'est pas aussi beau
‎que le manoir Baudelaire,

translation.en: but perhaps, children, with a bit of your money, we'll be able to fix it up, make it nicer.
translation.fr:
‎mais peut-être qu'avec un peu
‎de votre argent, nous pourrons l'arranger.

translation.en: Count Olaf, the Baudelaire fortune is not to be used for such matters.
translation.fr:
‎La fortune des Baudelaire
‎ne servira pas à cela.

translation.en: The Baudelaire will is very specific as to how the children are to be raised
translation.fr:
‎Le testament est très clair
‎sur la façon d'élever les enfants

translation.en: in case of an unfortunate event.
Ah, yes, the fire.
They're to be raised by their closest relative.
That is I, Count Olaf.
And every cent of the Baudelaire fortune is locked up until Violet comes of age.
translation.fr:
‎Leur fortune est bloquée
‎jusqu'à la majorité de Violette.

translation.en: -Which one is Violet? -[Mr. Poe] The eldest.
All right, then. [inhales deeply]
Well, I hope I can prove myself to be the father you never had.
translation.fr:
‎J'espère devenir le père
‎que vous n'avez jamais eu.

translation.en: We had a father.
Yes, I know. And a mother.
Remarkable woman. Flammable.
So, Poe, do I need to sign for them or something?
What? No. No.
Well, then, as we say in the theater, exit stage right.
translation.fr:
‎Eh bien, comme on dit au théâtre,
‎à la fin, on quitte la scène.

translation.en: Goodbye, Violet. Goodbye, Klaus. Goodbye, Sunny.
I hope you'll be happy here. I'll still check in on you occasionally.
translation.fr:
‎J'espère que vous serez heureux ici.
‎Je passerai vous voir.

translation.en: If you need anything or have questions, you can reach me at the bank.
translation.fr:
‎En cas de besoin ou de questions,
‎passez à la banque.

translation.en: Well, children, before I give you a tour of your new home,
translation.fr:
‎Les enfants, avant de vous faire visiter
‎votre nouvelle maison,

translation.en: aren't you going to say "How do you do?"
to your new guardian?
How do you do?
How do I do?
Better and better, Baudelaires.
Better and better.
The dreadful villainy of this vile fiend
has haunted me since I first met him as a young man.
translation.fr:
‎me hante depuis que je l'ai rencontré
‎quand j'étais jeune.

translation.en: And every night when I continue my work on the Baudelaire case,
translation.fr:
‎Chaque soir, en me plongeant
‎sur le dossier Baudelaire,

translation.en: I find myself weeping thinking of his utter wickedness
translation.fr:
‎je me mets à pleurer
‎en pensant à son absolue cruauté

translation.en: and severe lack of theatrical talent.
translation.fr: ‎et son cruel manque de talent théâtral.

translation.en: -Do you know what this is? -It looks like a list.
translation.fr:
‎- Savez-vous ce que c'est ?
‎- On dirait une liste.

translation.en: Wrong! It's a list. A list of chores.
Rich brats like you are probably spoiled rotten and have never done a chore in your life.
translation.fr:
‎Des mioches pourris gâtés comme vous
‎n'ont jamais dû faire de corvées.

translation.en: Actually, we often help around the house.
translation.fr: ‎En fait, on aide souvent à la maison.

translation.en: [mockingly] Really? Did you help around the house? That's great.
[normal] Well, welcome to your lucky life.
Come with me, and I'll show you the delightful features of your home.
translation.fr:
‎Suivez-moi, que je vous montre
‎les charmantes facettes de votre maison.

translation.en: This is the kitchen, where you may help yourselves to meals.
translation.fr:
‎Voici la cuisine,
‎là où vous vous ferez à manger.

translation.en: I expect you to keep everything gleamingly clean.
translation.fr:
‎Je compte sur vous
‎pour que ce soit reluisamment propre.

translation.en: "Gleamingly"?
-Clean. -[fly buzzing]
The stove is a bit like a servant.
-You have to whack it sometimes... -[knuckles cracking] ...to get it to work.
translation.fr:
‎Il faut lui donner un grand coup
‎pour qu'elle marche.

translation.en: This is the library, which you will keep well-dusted.
translation.fr:
‎Voici la bibliothèque,
‎vous y ferez souvent la poussière.

translation.en: This is where I do all my reading.
I don't use the ballroom at all.
translation.fr: ‎Je n'utilise jamais la salle de bal.

translation.en: You'll have to redo the floors.
Laundry room. You can hang my underwear on that rack when you're done washing it.
translation.fr:
‎La buanderie. Étendez mon petit linge
‎là-dessus une fois que vous l'aurez lavé.

translation.en: This is the backyard, which needs weeding, mowing and pruning.
translation.fr:
‎Voici le jardin, qu'il faudra désherber,
‎tondre et élaguer.

translation.en: It is also where you will chop wood.
translation.fr: ‎C'est aussi là que vous couperez le bois.

translation.en: Bathroom number seven, the only one you are allowed to use.
translation.fr:
‎La salle de bains numéro sept
‎est la seule que vous utiliserez.

translation.en: It has all the usual amenities,
though the management regrets to inform you
translation.fr: ‎mais j'ai le regret de vous dire

translation.en: that the shampoo is not tear-free.
If anything, it encourages tears.
Rats bite.
And this is where you will sleep, orphans.
Out of all the numerous bedrooms in this enormous mansion,
translation.fr:
‎De toutes les chambres
‎de cet immense manoir,

translation.en: I have chose this one for your safety and comfort.
translation.fr:
‎j'ai choisi celle-ci
‎pour votre confort et sécurité.

translation.en: There's only one bed.
As you can see, I have provided, at no cost to you,
translation.fr:
‎Comme vous pouvez le voir,
‎je vous offre gratuitement

translation.en: this complimentary pile of rocks.
Thoughts?
Thoughts? First of all--
First of all, first impressions are often wrong.
Very true.
For example, your first impression of me may be that I am a terrible person.
translation.fr:
‎Par exemple, vous devez penser
‎que je suis une affreuse personne.

translation.en: But in time, Baudelaires, I hope you'll come to realize...
translation.fr:
‎Mais avec le temps, les Baudelaire,
‎vous vous rendrez compte...

translation.en: you haven't the faintest idea.
translation.fr: ‎que vous n'avez pas idée à quel point.

translation.en: I'll give you a moment to unpack.
It's okay, Sunny, he's gone.
He's horrible.
Did you see the tattoo on his ankle?
A tattoo is just a decorative pigment on skin. It's not a sign of a wicked person.
translation.fr:
‎Ce n'est qu'un pigment pour faire joli,
‎ça ne veut pas dire qu'il est méchant.

translation.en: -Unless it's on a wicked person. -[sighs]
How could our parents put us here?
translation.fr:
‎Comment nos parents ont pu
‎nous envoyer ici ?

translation.en: [sighs] It's just a mistake. It'll get sorted out.
Until then, we'll make this our home.
translation.fr:
‎En attendant,
‎on va en faire notre chez-nous.

translation.en: Mother used to say, "Home is where you hang your hat."
translation.fr:
‎Selon maman, chez soi,
‎c'est là qu'on pend son chapeau.

translation.en: But we don't have any hats.
Just rocks.
Klaus, have you read any books on people who make homes in difficult places?
translation.fr:
‎Klaus, as-tu lu des livres sur des gens
‎qui vivent en milieu inhospitalier ?

translation.en: There's a village in the Pacific Islands suspended on ropes above an active volcano.
translation.fr:
‎Il y a un village en Polynésie suspendu
‎par une corde au-dessus d'un volcan.

translation.en: How do they manage?
They own very little in case it erupts.
translation.fr:
‎Ils ont très peu de biens
‎en cas d'éruption.

translation.en: Then we're already one step ahead.
-We own nothing. -[chuckles lightly]
If they can survive that, we can survive Count Olaf.
translation.fr:
‎S'ils peuvent survivre à ça,
‎on peut survivre au comte Olaf.

translation.en: Showtime!
Remember, if you work extra hard, you get to go to the ball... room...
translation.fr:
‎Si vous travaillez très dur,
‎vous irez faire... la salle de bal...

translation.en: which is even grimier.
Hang on to your toothbrushes.
You'll need them for your teeth.
translation.fr: ‎Vous en aurez besoin pour vos dents.

translation.en: -[doorbell chiming] -Stay here. And not a peep.
You're a little old for a Girl Scout.
I'm Justice Strauss.
Doesn't ring a bell.
I'm your neighbor. I... I live across the street.
translation.fr: ‎Je suis votre voisine. Je vis en face.

translation.en: You've done something different to your hair.
May I come in?
Is this about the children?
I apologize for the noise. I told them to cry using their inside voices.
translation.fr:
‎Je m'excuse pour le bruit.
‎Je leur ai dit de pleurer intérieurement.

translation.en: -What? -Hmm?
I... I just thought I'd stop by and see how they're doing.
I know it's a little soon, but I'm about to become very busy
translation.fr:
‎C'est un peu tôt,
‎mais je vais être prise

translation.en: with a difficult case in High Court.
translation.fr: ‎par un gros procès à la Haute Cour.

translation.en: I'm not supposed to talk about it,
translation.fr: ‎Je ne suis pas censée en parler,

translation.en: but I can tell you that it involved an illegal use of someone's credit card...
translation.fr:
‎mais ça concerne l'utilisation
‎frauduleuse d'une carte de crédit

translation.en: and a poisonous plant.
I made them this lamb.
How neighborly.
I don't mean to seem like a lonely woman
translation.fr:
‎Je ne veux pas
‎donner l'impression d'être seule

translation.en: who's overinvested in the lives of someone else's children...
translation.fr:
‎et de me préoccuper de la vie
‎des enfants d'autrui...

translation.en: You do have that aura.
Perhaps if I just pop in for a quick hello--
translation.fr:
‎Si je pouvais
‎leur dire bonjour vite fait...

translation.en: Now is not a good time. They're in one of their moods. [shudders]
translation.fr:
‎Le moment est mal choisi.
‎Ils piquent une colère.

translation.en: They seemed so sweet.
Do you have children, Justice Strauss?
Me?
Oh, no. No.
No, I always hoped I would, but I'm married to the law,
translation.fr:
‎Non, j'ai toujours espéré en avoir,
‎mais je suis mariée à la loi,

translation.en: and you can't very well have book babies...
translation.fr:
‎et on ne peut pas vraiment
‎avoir d'enfants...

translation.en: now, can you?
Well, you dodged a bullet.
Let me tell you, those children are monsters.
translation.fr:
‎Je vous assure
‎que ces enfants sont des monstres.

translation.en: I open my home to them, and all they do is complain.
translation.fr:
‎Je leur ai ouvert ma porte,
‎et ils ne cessent de se plaindre.

translation.en: "The bathroom is filthy.
The rat is noisy. The bed is cramped."
translation.fr:
‎Le rat fait du bruit.
‎On est à l'étroit dans le lit."

translation.en: I think living in a mansion has spoiled them.
translation.fr:
‎Vivre dans un manoir
‎leur est monté à la tête.

translation.en: Well, they did just lose their--
Did you say "bed"?
I meant "bed" as in "more than one bed," obviously.
The plural of "bed" is... "bed."
Well, I wouldn't know. I live alone.
translation.fr: ‎Je n'en sais rien. Je vis seule.

translation.en: No kidding.
At least give them the lamb.
I made my own mint jelly and...
translation.fr:
‎J'ai fait ma recette
‎de gelée à la menthe, et...

translation.en: Please, just ask them if they'd like to see me.
translation.fr:
‎S'il vous plaît,
‎demandez-leur s'ils veulent me voir.

translation.en: [sighs] Fine.
But wait here, for your own safety. They tend to throw things.
translation.fr:
‎Mais attendez là, pour votre sécurité.
‎Ils lancent des projectiles.

translation.en: You missed a spot.
They don't want to see you.
Are you sure? What did they say?
"The lamb was too salty."
Rich kids.
Oh... I see.
[Lemony] If only Justice Strauss had been able to get past Count Olaf,
translation.fr:
‎Si seulement la juge Abbott
‎était passée devant le comte Olaf.

translation.en: if only she'd seen the children in their horrible circumstances,
translation.fr:
‎Si elle avait vu les conditions de vie
‎terribles des enfants,

translation.en: if only this world weren't such a wicked and topsy-turvy place...
translation.fr:
‎si seulement ce monde n'était pas
‎aussi cruel et sens dessus-dessous,

translation.en: this story might have turned out differently.
-I never wanna use a toothbrush again. -[door opens]
translation.fr:
‎Je n'utiliserai plus jamais
‎de brosse à dents.

translation.en: Why aren't you cleaning? My list was very specific.
We finished it.
No, you didn't.
We even washed your underwear.
You missed one.
You still have to prepare a large meal for myself and my theater troupe.
translation.fr:
‎Vous devez préparer un grand repas
‎pour ma troupe de théâtre et moi.

translation.en: We don't know how to prepare a large dinner.
translation.fr: ‎On ne sait pas préparer un grand repas.

translation.en: Plan the menu, purchase the ingredients,
prepare the food, set the table, serve dinner, clean up afterward,
translation.fr:
‎préparez la nourriture, mettez la table,
‎servez le repas, nettoyez derrière

translation.en: and stay out of our way.
How can we purchase anything? We don't have any money.
translation.fr: ‎On n'a pas d'argent pour les ingrédients.

translation.en: Do you know what that is?
-Something greasy. -Money.
Hard-earned money.
The most important substance on earth besides applause and lip balm.
translation.fr:
‎La chose la plus importante sur Terre,
‎après les ovations et le baume à lèvres.

translation.en: Since the bossy banker won't let us use any of your parents' enormous fortune,
translation.fr:
‎Comme le banquier ne veut pas qu'on pioche
‎dans la fortune de vos parents,

translation.en: I am now forced to cough up my own earnings
translation.fr:
‎je suis obligé de débourser
‎mes propres gains

translation.en: from theatrical performances and the occasional bit of consulting work.
translation.fr:
‎issus de mes performances théâtrales
‎et missions de conseil.

translation.en: Now... quick. Get a move on.
The troupe will be here at 7:00.
And in the meantime, I will be up in...
Can you guess?
Your secret tower room?
Wrong! My secret tower room.
Which you are forbidden to go into. Understood? Forbidden!
-Forbidden. -That's... Yes.
How are we supposed to make dinner for an entire theater troupe?
translation.fr:
‎Comment va-t-on cuisiner un repas
‎pour toute une troupe de théâtre ?

translation.en: We start with a recipe.
Do you think Justice Strauss' library has any cookbooks?
translation.fr:
‎Tu crois que la juge Abbott
‎a des livres de cuisine ?

translation.en: [gasps] Baudelaires. I wasn't expecting to see you.
translation.fr:
‎Les Baudelaire.
‎Je ne m'attendais pas à vous voir.

translation.en: We meant to come sooner. We've been cleaning.
translation.fr: ‎On voulait passer plus tôt. On nettoyait.

translation.en: Yes, Count Olaf told me you were very particular about that.
translation.fr:
‎Oui, le comte m'a dit
‎que vous faisiez les difficiles.

translation.en: I hope you appreciate how much he's doing for you.
I wouldn't say "much."
Well, perhaps not compared to what you're used to.
translation.fr:
‎Peut-être pas comparé
‎à ce dont vous aviez l'habitude.

translation.en: What can I do for you?
Actually, Justice Strauss, we really need your help.
translation.fr: ‎Juge Abbott, on a besoin de votre aide.

translation.en: You do?
My sisters and I were wondering...
Wondering what?
If we might use your library.
If you might use my library.
Is there any book you're looking for in particular?
A cookbook, so we can make dinner.
translation.fr: ‎Un livre de cuisine, pour faire le dîner.

translation.en: I suppose anything but lamb.
Well, my private library is open to you whenever you'd like.
translation.fr:
‎Ma bibliothèque personnelle
‎vous est ouverte quand vous le souhaitez.

translation.en: It's mostly law books, but there are sections on everything
translation.fr:
‎J'ai surtout des livres de droit,
‎mais il y a d'autres sections

translation.en: from Italian cuisine to the world's most threatening fungus.
translation.fr:
‎qui vont de la cuisine italienne
‎au champignon le plus dangereux du monde.

translation.en: I suppose it's not as nice as the libraries you're used to, but...
translation.fr:
‎Vous avez dû être habitués
‎à de plus jolies bibliothèques, mais...

translation.en: -It's marvelous. -It's wonderful.
Do you really think so?
-[squeaks] -That means she likes it.
Well, I'm so glad.
The cookbooks are over there in Section G,
translation.fr:
‎Les livres de cuisine sont là-bas,
‎dans la section G,

translation.en: and right here is my favorite table for serious research.
translation.fr:
‎et ici se trouve ma table préférée
‎pour les recherches sérieuses.

translation.en: Do you have a paper and pencil to take notes?
translation.fr:
‎Tu as un crayon et du papier
‎pour prendre des notes ?

translation.en: Always.
-[Strauss] What's that? -It’s something my parents had.
translation.fr:
‎- Qu'est-ce que c'est ?
‎- C'était à mes parents.

translation.en: -What is it? -I don't know.
Something, Klaus Baudelaire, is ringing a very faint bell.
translation.fr:
‎Ceci, Klaus Baudelaire,
‎me rappelle vaguement quelque chose.

translation.en: A library is like an island in a vast sea of ignorance.
translation.fr:
‎Une bibliothèque, c'est une île
‎dans un vaste océan d'ignorance.

translation.en: Don't you agree?
I do. Particularly if the library is tall and the surrounded area has been flooded.
translation.fr:
‎Si. Surtout si la bibliothèque est grande
‎et que les alentours ont été inondés.

translation.en: That's a very good point.
These books look promising.
Klaus, help your sister. Let me see what I can find here.
translation.fr:
‎Klaus, aide ta sœur.
‎Je vais voir ce que je trouve.

translation.en: I think I found something. Pasta puttanesca.
translation.fr: ‎J'ai trouvé. Des pâtes à la puttanesca.

translation.en: I wonder what that means in Italian.
All we have to do is sauté garlics and onions in a pot,
translation.fr: ‎On doit faire sauter l'ail et les oignons,

translation.en: and then add olives, capers, anchovies, diced parsley and tomatoes to simmer.
translation.fr:
‎puis ajouter olives, câpres, anchois,
‎persil et tomates, et faire mijoter.

translation.en: We still need the pasta.
I saw a pasta machine in Count Olaf's kitchen.
translation.fr: ‎J'ai vu une machine à pâtes chez le comte.

translation.en: -Looked broken, but I think I can fix it. -What do we have here?
Justice Strauss?
-Yes? -Is there a supermarket nearby?
translation.fr:
‎- Oui ?
‎- Y a-t-il un supermarché pas loin ?

translation.en: Oh... no.
But there is a local open-air market and gin distillery.
translation.fr:
‎Mais il y a un marché à ciel ouvert
‎et une distillerie de gin.

translation.en: Thanks again for taking us.
I don't know what we would have done without you.
Oh, you're resourceful children.
I daresay you would have thought of something.
I think it's nice that you're cooking dinner
for Count Olaf and your new theatrical family.
translation.fr:
‎pour le comte Olaf
‎et votre nouvelle famille d'acteurs.

translation.en: I had dreams of becoming an actress, you know.
translation.fr: ‎Je rêvais de devenir actrice, vous savez.

translation.en: An actress and a mother, instead of ending up
translation.fr:
‎Actrice et mère, ‎au lieu d'être une juriste
‎mondialement reconnue,

translation.en: as a world-renowned member of the judiciary...
and in a series of strained, platonic relationships.
Baudelaires?
I always find cooking for family to be something of a mitzvah.
translation.fr:
‎Cuisiner pour sa famille
‎me fait penser à une ‎mitzvah‎.

translation.en: Do you know what that means?
-Commandment? -Blessing.
You children have had such sorrow in your lives already,
you deserve the blessing of a new family with Count Olaf,
translation.fr:
‎que vous méritez la bénédiction
‎d'une nouvelle famille avec le comte Olaf,

translation.en: and, if you don't mind my saying so...
with me.
[chuckles] We don't mind your saying so.
Klaus, what's that thing James Brown said?
"I feel good."
-[accordion playing] -And a one, and a two, and a...
♪ It's the count, it's the count It's the count ♪
translation.fr:
‎C'est le comte, le comte
‎C'est le comte

translation.en: ♪ Who else has such robust good looks In such a large amount? ♪
translation.fr:
‎Qui d'autre a autant de beauté
‎À son compte ?

translation.en: ♪ I'm handsome and I'm talented And love your bank account ♪
translation.fr:
‎Je suis beau, j'ai du talent
‎Et seule votre fortune compte

translation.en: ♪ It's the count, it's the count It's the count ♪
translation.fr:
‎C'est le comte, le comte
‎C'est le comte

translation.en: ♪ The "C" is for courageous Just another word for brave ♪
translation.fr:
‎Un C pour courageux
‎Un autre mot pour vaillant

translation.en: -[troupe] ♪ O! ♪ -♪ Oh, my God ♪
♪ What a very handsome knave ♪
translation.fr: ‎Voilà un homme qui a du piquant

translation.en: -[troupe] ♪ U! ♪ -♪ Unbelievable good looks ♪
♪ And brains and heart ♪
-♪ N! ♪ -♪ For the knowledge ♪
♪ 'Cause I'm very, very smart ♪
-♪ T! ♪ -♪ For the talent ♪
♪ Which is such a crucial factor ♪
♪ When you're handsome and good-looking ♪
♪ And the world's greatest actor ♪
[troupe] ♪ It's the count, it's the count It's the count ♪
translation.fr:
‎C'est le comte, le comte
‎C'est le comte

translation.en: ♪ Who else has such robust good looks In such a large amount? ♪
translation.fr:
‎Qui d'autre a autant de beauté
‎À son compte ?

translation.en: ♪ I'm handsome and I'm talented And love your bank account ♪
translation.fr:
‎Je suis beau, j'ai du talent
‎Et seule votre fortune compte

translation.en: ♪ It's the count, it's the count It's the count ♪
translation.fr:
‎C'est le comte, le comte
‎C'est le comte

translation.en: ♪ It's the count ♪
♪ The count ♪
Yes, we've met.
Orphans... [clears throat] ...this is my theater troupe.
translation.fr: ‎Les orphelins, voici ma troupe de théâtre.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
And as anyone in the theater knows, after a grand entrance,
the audience is supposed to applaud.
"Applaud" means go like this.
We're not an audience.
No, orphans, you are not.
But we have been preparing an exciting new production
translation.fr:
‎Mais on a préparé
‎une nouvelle production palpitante,

translation.en: that, on opening night, will change your life.
translation.fr:
‎qui, lors de la première,
‎changera votre vie.

translation.en: All of the artistic and financial aspects of my career are finally coming together
translation.fr:
‎Tous les aspects financiers et artistiques
‎de ma carrière se rejoignent

translation.en: like two pieces of a bread in the middle of a sandwich.
translation.fr:
‎comme deux morceaux de pain
‎à l'intérieur d'un sandwich.

translation.en: What my sister means is that--
I don't care what she means.
I don't have time to learn a second language besides whatever it is I'm speaking right now.
translation.fr:
‎Pas le temps d'apprendre une langue autre
‎que celle que je parle actuellement.

translation.en: In any case, we demand congratulations.
translation.fr:
‎Dans tous les cas,
‎on exige des félicitations.

translation.en: [both] Congratulations.
A big round of applause.
And the delicious meal that you promised myself and my troupe.
translation.fr:
‎Et le délicieux repas
‎promis à ma troupe et moi.

translation.en: You know, every time she talks,
it's like the tines of a fork are being jammed into my--
translation.fr:
‎c'est comme si on me plantait
‎une fourchette dans...

translation.en: What my sister means is, dinner will be served shortly.
translation.fr: ‎Elle a dit que le dîner arrivait.

translation.en: What are we supposed to do until then?
-We could wait patiently. -How about some wine, Olaf?
translation.fr:
‎- On pourrait attendre patiemment.
‎- Si on buvait du vin, Olaf ?

translation.en: Yes, yes, wine. We had that nice rosé last time.
translation.fr: ‎Oui, du vin. Votre rosé était très bon.

translation.en: It wasn't rosé, it was just watered down.
translation.fr:
‎Ce n'était pas du rosé,
‎il était coupé à l'eau.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, fine. I'll open up a box of the Merlote.
translation.fr:
‎Très bien.
‎Je vais ouvrir un carton de merlot.

translation.en: An associate of mine named Brillat-Savarin famously said,
translation.fr:
‎Un de mes confrères appelé Brillat-Savarin
‎est connu pour avoir dit :

translation.en: "To invite people to dine with us is to make ourselves responsible
translation.fr:
‎"Inviter des gens à dîner,
‎c'est nous rendre responsable

translation.en: for their well-being as long as they are under our roofs."
translation.fr:
‎de leur bien-être
‎tant qu'ils sont sous notre toit."

translation.en: But he was an 18th century philosopher and gourmand...
translation.fr:
‎Mais ce philosophe gourmand
‎vivait au XVIIIe siècle...

translation.en: and these were three children with very little catering experience.
translation.fr:
‎et ces trois enfants
‎n'avaient pas l'habitude de cuisiner.

translation.en: Nevertheless, the Baudelaire orphans snapped into action.
translation.fr:
‎Néanmoins, les orphelins Baudelaire
‎se mirent aux fourneaux.

translation.en: This pasta maker reminds me of the one built by Thomas Jefferson.
translation.fr:
‎Cette machine à pâtes me rappelle
‎celle de Thomas Jefferson.

translation.en: Will it work?
-It will now. -[chuckles]
I wonder if Count Olaf's troupe will enjoy this meal.
Mother said that actors will eat anything.
translation.fr:
‎Maman disait
‎que les acteurs mangeaient de tout.

translation.en: You've seen them perform. Would you call them actors?
translation.fr:
‎Tu les as vu jouer.
‎Tu appelles ça des acteurs ?

translation.en: -They're all as talented as Count Olaf. -[scoffs]
translation.fr: ‎Ils ont autant de talent que le comte.

translation.en: [Lemony] While they waited for the pasta to boil,
Violet sautéed the garlic, and washed and chopped the anchovies.
translation.fr:
‎Violette faisait revenir l'ail
‎et coupait les anchois.

translation.en: Klaus peeled the tomatoes and pitted the olives.
translation.fr:
‎Klaus pelait les tomates
‎et dénoyautait les olives.

translation.en: And Sunny banged on a pot with a wooden spoon,
singing a rather repetitive song she had written herself.
translation.fr:
‎en chantant un air répétitif
‎de son invention.

translation.en: By the time it was time for the youngest Baudelaire
to chop the parsley with her teeth...
all three children felt less miserable than they had...
since they first came to Count Olaf's.
translation.fr: ‎qu'à leur arrivée chez le comte Olaf.

translation.en: I think Dad would be proud of this sauce.
And I think Mom would be proud of how you made your own pasta.
Maybe we can make this our home after all.
Remember what Father said when he burnt the quesadillas?
translation.fr:
‎Tu te souviens ce que papa a dit
‎en brûlant les ‎quesadillas ‎?

translation.en: Yeah.
"Better than nothing."
At times like these, surrounded by colleagues and cohorts,
translation.fr:
‎Alors que je suis entouré
‎de collègues et comparses,

translation.en: gathered in fellowship for the purpose of plotting theater,
there's an eternal question that always springs to mind...
translation.fr:
‎une éternelle question
‎ne cesse de me turlupiner :

translation.en: [yelling] When are we going to eat?
Dinner is served.
-Wow, that was quick. -And it smells delicious.
translation.fr:
‎- C'était rapide.
‎- Ça sent drôlement bon.

translation.en: -[Olaf groans] -I mean... [grunts]
As I was saying, before the help interrupted...
translation.fr:
‎Comme je le disais,
‎avant que le personnel ne m'interrompe...

translation.en: there is no "I" in acting...
translation.fr: ‎il n'y a pas de "je" au théâtre,

translation.en: no selfish urges, no arrogance,
no ego, no vanity,
no dangerous overabundance of inflated self-regard.
translation.fr:
‎pas de surabondance dangereuse
‎d'estime de soi prétentieuse.

translation.en: There is only what the French call a certain... "escargot."
translation.fr:
‎Il n'y a que ce que
‎les Français qualifient... "d'escargot".

translation.en: It is the first burst of applause when the curtain rises.
translation.fr:
‎Ce sont les premiers applaudissements
‎quand le rideau se lève.

translation.en: -[grunts] -The second burst of applause
translation.fr:
‎Ce sont les premiers applaudissements
‎quand le rideau se lève. ‎La 2e vague d'applaudissements,

translation.en: when the leading man glides out from the wings,
faces his crowd and recites the--
translation.fr: ‎fait face à la foule et récite son...

translation.en: -Soliloquy. -[sighs]
I'm... That's... His soliloquy.
It is the thrill of the 14th mandatory standing ovation.
I give and I give to my public
translation.fr: ‎Je donne sans cesse à mon public,

translation.en: just as I give and I give to these orphans.
translation.fr: ‎tout comme je donne à ces orphelins.

translation.en: But sometimes, and every actor does this,
translation.fr: ‎Mais parfois, et chaque acteur le fait,

translation.en: I ask myself, "Is it worth it?
translation.fr: ‎je me demande si ça en valait la peine.

translation.en: Is it really worth it to chase an enormous fortune?"
translation.fr:
‎Est-ce que ça vaut la peine
‎de courir après une immense fortune ?

translation.en: [clearing throat] Boss...
-Where's the roast beef? -What?
translation.fr:
‎- Où est le rôti de bœuf ?
‎- Quoi ?

translation.en: The roast beef.
We didn't make any roast beef. We made puttanesca sauce.
translation.fr:
‎On n'a pas fait de rôti.
‎On a fait une sauce à la puttanesca.

translation.en: And homemade pasta.
What? No roast beef?
You didn't tell us you wanted roast beef.
translation.fr:
‎Vous n'avez pas précisé
‎que vous vouliez un rôti.

translation.en: Look at my guests!
They... they can hardly touch this revolting foreign food.
translation.fr:
‎Ils osent à peine toucher
‎à cette répugnante nourriture étrangère.

translation.en: [scoffs] In agreeing to adopt you, I became your father.
translation.fr:
‎En acceptant de vous adopter,
‎je suis devenu votre père.

translation.en: And as your father, I am not someone to be trifled with.
translation.fr:
‎En tant que tel,
‎vous devez me prendre au sérieux.

translation.en: You can't go easy on children. They need to be taught to obey their elders.
translation.fr:
‎Les enfants doivent apprendre
‎à obéir à leurs aînés.

translation.en: You asked them to make dinner. And all they did was slap together some disgusting sauce.
translation.fr:
‎- Vous leur demandez de cuisiner.
‎- Ils vous sortent une sauce dégoûtante.

translation.en: That's what happens with wealthy kids. Money is really a corrupting influence.
translation.fr:
‎C'est le problème des enfants fortunés.
‎L'argent corrompt.

translation.en: Well, let's not get carried away.
Hmm. You're a pretty little one.
I demand that you serve roast beef to myself and my guests!
translation.fr:
‎J'exige que vous serviez du rôti
‎à mes invités et moi-même !

translation.en: We don't have any. We made pasta puttanesca.
translation.fr:
‎Il n'y en a pas.
‎On a fait des pâtes à la puttanesca.

translation.en: -[Violet] Sunny! -Put her down.
[chuckles deviously] Alas, poor Sunny.
-Let her go! -[all gasp]
This table is a mess. There's hardly a place to put down a baby.
translation.fr:
‎Quel bazar sur cette table.
‎Nulle part où poser un bébé.

translation.en: [Violet] Sunny!
We're leaving for rehearsals.
But the baby said there was chocolate pudding! Shh.
translation.fr:
‎Le bébé a dit
‎qu'il y avait du gâteau au chocolat !

translation.en: You children are to clean the table,
and wash the dishes, and polish the silver,
and rinse out all the wine bottles for recycling.
translation.fr:
‎et rincez les bouteilles de vin
‎à recycler.

translation.en: And then you are to go straight to your beds.
You mean our bed?
You've only provided us with one bed.
translation.fr: ‎Vous ne nous en avez donné qu'un seul.

translation.en: If you want another bed,
tomorrow you may go into town and purchase one.
translation.fr:
‎allez en ville demain
‎vous en acheter un autre.

translation.en: You know perfectly well we haven't any money.
translation.fr: ‎On n'a pas d'argent, vous le savez.

translation.en: Hmm. Of course you do.
You three lucky orphans are inheriting an enormous fortune.
The money our parents left behind is not to be used until Violet--
The theater awaits.
-Are you all right? -No. [whimpers]
-This isn't. -What?
Better than nothing.
[Lemony] There are many, many things that are better than nothing.
translation.fr:
‎Il y a beaucoup de choses
‎qui sont mieux que rien.

translation.en: A home-cooked meal is better than nothing.
translation.fr:
‎Un repas fait maison,
‎c'est mieux que rien.

translation.en: A roof over one's head is better than nothing.
translation.fr:
‎Un toit sur nos têtes,
‎c'est mieux que rien.

translation.en: And a place to sleep,
even if the bed is very small and the blanket damp with tears,
translation.fr:
‎même si le lit est petit
‎et que la couette est humide de larmes,

translation.en: is better than nothing.
But being raised in a violent and sinister environment
translation.fr:
‎Mais être élevé dans un environnement
‎violent et sinistre

translation.en: by a man more interested in one's fortune than comfort and well-being
translation.fr:
‎par un homme plus intéressé
‎par votre fortune que votre bien-être,

translation.en: is not better than nothing.
And as the Baudelaires would discover,
there are some things that even a long night of introspection cannot change.
translation.fr:
‎que même une longue nuit d'introspection
‎ne peut résoudre certains problèmes.

translation.en: [Lemony] The Baudelaire orphans knew they had to find a way
out of their dreadfully unfortunate circumstances,
and, perhaps, solve the mystery of how they ended up in them.
translation.fr:
‎Et peut-être résoudre le mystère
‎qui les avait conduits dedans. ‎L'HISTOIRE INCOMPLÈTE...

translation.en: I have the same dedication to researching and presenting this story
translation.fr:
‎Je ferai tout pour faire éclater
‎la vérité au grand jour,

translation.en: no matter what dangers it puts me in.
translation.fr: ‎même si je dois me retrouver en danger.

translation.en: Trouble and strife can cover this world like the dark of night,
translation.fr:
‎Les conflits peuvent recouvrir le monde
‎d'un halo de noirceur,

translation.en: or like smoke from a suspicious fire.
And when that happens...
...all good, true and decent people know that it's time to volunteer.
translation.fr:
‎Tous les gens honnêtes savent
‎qu'il est temps de se porter volontaire.

translation.en: -I'm worried about the children. -Me, too.
translation.fr:
‎- Je m'inquiète pour les enfants.
‎- Moi aussi.

translation.en: They're in danger, I know it.
translation.fr: ‎Ils sont en danger. Je le sens.

translation.en: We need to get to them.
We need to get out of here first.
[sighs] What's that thing Einstein said?
